remarks: The LUB of a projective map is the projective map's argument. (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pmaplub.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmaplub.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
pmaplub.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmaplubN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( U ` ( M ` X ) ) = X ) $.
